title: Strategies for Improving Employee Satisfaction through Workplace Learning Support

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of core job competencies and understanding of organizational culture
context.additional_context: Learning support strategy design for office/administrative roles reflecting manufacturing environments.

learning_goals: They can present three specific action plans to expand learning opportunities within a work system.
They can design an incentive system to motivate employee learning.
They can derive five core metrics for measuring workplace learning satisfaction.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
